body.name: HeyxFome X1 2024 New 4G LTE GSM Unlocked Cell Phone 6.5” HD+ Screen Mobile Phones 4000mAh Android 10 Smart Phone 16MP Smartphone Dual SIM (for T-Mobile Metro Mint Tello USA Market) Face Unlock (Gold)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 2 hrs 1 min
features: 「4G LTE Dual Nano SIM Card」 Factory unlocked 4G smartphones are compatible with most GSM carriers like T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network. Howerver, this cell phone is not compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon, Visible, Total Wireless, Xfinity Wireless, Sprint, Tracfone, Straight Talk, Spectrum, Simple, Boost or U.S.Cellular. Additionally, this mobile phone is not compatible with AT&T, Cricket, H2O, Consumer Cellular or FreedomPop. Please confirm your carrier before purchasing to prevent you from being unable to use your network. No SIM card in package.

「6.5” HD+ Full-view Screen Android Phone Weight Only 188g」The 6.5-inch large water-drop screen paired with 1600 x 720 HD+ pixels gives you a delicate feeling of the unlocked cellphone’s screen. The aspect ratio of the android phone is 19:9, and the screen proportion is 80.33%. The unlocked smartphone is about 0.33 inches thick and weighs only 188g, providing you with an excellent grip feel.

「The Newest Android 10 Phones With Night Mode」The addition of night mode in android 10 system can more effectively protect your eyes in dim light environments, especially for the elderly and children. The updated android 10 system features with face id improved security, faster performance, better privacy controls, and a more intuitive user interface, ensuring you a seamlessly fluid experience.

「RAM 2GB + ROM 16GB / 256GB TF Card Expansion」It should be noted that the package doesn’t include TF cards. RAM 2GB of running memory helps you smoothly switch between multiple daily apps without getting stuck. And the cell phone with 16GB of built-in storage, it is enough to store daily photos. However, the system will occupy some storage space, so your unlocked cell phone will be less than 16GB. According to personal needs, you can add an external TF card up to 256GB for expansion.

「Who Is This Mobile Phone Suitable For」If you enjoy downloading many apps or you are a gamer, we are sorry this cellphone isn’t very suitable for you. This is a cheap smartphone that has given up as much profit as possible. We don’t have strong performance, please don’t compare us with high-performance phones. Therefore, if you are looking for your first phone for daily communication, browsing the internet, watching videos, and you will spend less time on phones. This will be a good choice.
「16MP Main Smart Phone Camera」This unlocked smartphone is equipped with a rear 16MP main camera and a 5MP front camera, making it a great expert at recording beautiful moments in life.

「4000mAh Battery But No Fast Charging」The smartphone is equipped with a 4000mAh battery that is enough to support normal use for 1 day. Attention, phone’s battery is unremovable! Please don’t open the phone cover! If the battery runs out and the cell phone can’t be turned on, please charge it for more than 30 min without any action. Unfortunately, this cellphone doesn’t support fast charging, so it will take about 2 hours to fully charge from 0%. Please arrange a charging time before going out.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Features of HeyxFome X1: Android: 10.0 Battery capacity: 4000mAh (non-removable) Memory: 2GB RAM + 16GB ROM (TF card up to 256GB) Screen size: 6.5 inches (Resolution: 720*1600) 19:9 HD+ IPS Rear Camera: 16MP, Front Camera: 5MP Dual card Dual standby: Nano-SIM+Nano-SIM+TF card（Card no include） 4G carrier: Only for T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network Practical functions: Face ID, WIFI 2.4+5G, GPS, G-sensor, Bluetooth V5, FM Radio, Email Size: 166*77.5*8.5mm. Weight: 189 grams Port: 1 x Type-C & 1 x Headphone Jack

Full screen display, take you to enjoy the infinite new world 6.5-inch Large Screen On the large 6.5-inch screen of your smartphone, you can enjoy the stunning visual experience and vivid display effects brought by each movie. 80.33% Screen-to-Body Ratio, allowing you to see more and enjoy more. 19:9 Aspect Ratio The 19:9 aspect ratio makes watching videos and playing games more comfortable, bringing you endless visual enjoyment! Full, Vivid, Smooth, Huge Display Effect The 720x1600 HD+ display takes your viewing experience to a new level in different scenarios.
Smart cell phone is slim, elegant and high quality At 8.5mm thin and weighing just 189g, the affordable smartphone is easy to hold and operate with one hand.

The large 4000mAh battery meets your daily needs ( the battery is NOT removable ) The 4000mAh battery can meet your light usage needs for a day, but if you enjoy heavy usage such as watching videos and playing games continuously, the time may be reduced. Moreover, if the outdoor temperature is low (below 10℃), the battery's usage time will also be reduced. If you have high requirements for battery life, it is recommended that you seek another phone with a larger battery life.

16MP Camera never miss any moment The HeyxFome X1 mobile phone is equipped with a 16MP main camera, allowing you to capture wonderful moments anytime, anywhere. It can clearly freeze the beautiful scenery in front of you, and intelligently capture every unforgettable moment with your family or friends.

Unlocked 4G smartphones are compatible with T-mobile carriers Unlocked T-mobile, Metro by T-mobile, Mint, Tello and any under T-mobile network.This cell phone is NOT compatible with CDMA carriers like Verizon, Visible, Total wireless, Xfinity, Sprint, Tracfone, Straight Talk, Spectrum, Simple, Boost or U.S.Cellular.Additionally, this mobile phone is NOT compatible with AT&T, Cricket, H2O, Consumer Cellular or FreedomPop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this phone!
reviews.reviewText: This phone is an android. It is VERY user friendly. I originally bought it because it was cost feasible. It's a first time phone for my 11 year old. She loves it! The screen size is awesome! It is super user friendly. It came unlocked so we can use on any network. Also when I ordered it I didn't realize it came with a clear case and screen protector so that was an added unexpected bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Crashes all the time
reviews.reviewText: Screen black out about 5 times a day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the size...
reviews.reviewText: So this was a phone I needed in a pinch that was affordable but worthy of taking decent pics and videos being I create content and am a chef. So far so good. Nice size screen! All the apps you need to get going and charges pretty fast actually! Great phone for a great price! If need a replacement phone look no further!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This phone IMEI registers as an IPHONE! This is FRAUD
reviews.reviewText: This phone is a fraud and so is the seller It registers in the system as an iPhone, even though it’s an android, which continues to glitch and is unusable. It was a waste of my time and my money and my efforts , and purchasing this as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for, the battery dies all the time and the speaker down work well. No fun at all

reviews.reviewText: This is a nice phone put me in the mind of a iPhone it very well works for me and it want expensive ❤️

reviews.reviewText: This was such a good buy. Love the speed. It's very clear to hear phone. Love the camera as well.
